author: vargasa
body:
#### PR description:

Remove `Geometry/MTCCTrackerCommonData` 

Announcement: https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/tracker-performance/2367.html

**Edit**:

Package was used long time ago (see below) and no longer used

Quoting @boudoul 
> MTCC... Magnet Test and Cosmic Challenge - 2006 - It reminds me the good old time :
> http://cds.cern.ch/record/1000413/files/CR2006_091.pdf
> http://cds.cern.ch/record/987868
title: Cleanup: Remove Geometry/MTCCTrackerCommonData
